item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, February 28, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Citigroup erroneously credited client account with $81tn in ‘near miss’
2. Wall Street stocks extend losses after sharp sell-off
3. US and UK in talks on trade deal that could spare Britain from tariffs
4. Trump cuts short Zelenskyy meeting after fiery White House clash
5. [Opinion] Why investors should be worrying about Trump and impoundment
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, February 28, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
